Posts.Content: Thankyou Ruby Rose. It is a family holiday in France going by ferry. My BC nurse said that there should be no problems. I have waited 3 years and so looking forward to having it done!
Posts.Title: Diep recovery

Posts.Content: Thankyou Kathryn. I am pleased that all went well with you. Am coming round to the thought that infact a holiday will do me good!
Posts.Title: Diep recovery

Posts.Content: Hi I am due diep surgery in a few weeks. This leaves me with 5 weeks revover before my holidays. My question is is this doable? Many thanks.
Posts.Title: Diep recovery

Posts.Content: Hi I am due a diep within the next few weeks with Mrs Taghizedah at Whiston. A.little dubious as I also have a colostomy. But she thinks that a diep is best for me and has a colorectal surgeon to work with her at my surgery.  X
